workouts.name: Chest Workout
workouts.description: Build strength and size in your chest

exercises.name: BENCH PRESS
exercises.instructions: Lie on flat bench, press barbell up from chest, lower slowly.

exercises.name: INCLINE DUMBBELL PRESS
exercises.instructions: Press dumbbells upward at 30-45° incline.

exercises.name: CHEST FLY MACHINE
exercises.instructions: Bring arms together in arc on fly machine.

exercises.name: PUSH-UPS
exercises.instructions: Keep body straight, lower chest to ground, push back up.

exercises.name: CABLE CROSSOVER
exercises.instructions: Pull cables together in front of chest with elbows slightly bent.

workouts.name: Back Workout
workouts.description: Strengthen lats, traps and spinal muscles

exercises.name: DEADLIFT
exercises.instructions: Lift barbell from ground keeping back straight.

exercises.name: PULL-UPS
exercises.instructions: Hang from bar, pull body up until chin clears bar.

exercises.name: LAT PULLDOWN
exercises.instructions: Pull bar down to chest while seated.

exercises.name: SEATED CABLE ROW
exercises.instructions: Pull cable handle toward abdomen, squeeze shoulder blades.

exercises.name: BENT OVER ROW
exercises.instructions: Row barbell to waist keeping back straight.

workouts.name: Triceps Workout
workouts.description: Focus on triceps for bigger arms

exercises.name: TRICEP PUSHDOWN
exercises.instructions: Push cable bar down until arms fully extend.

exercises.name: SKULL CRUSHERS
exercises.instructions: Lower barbell toward forehead, extend arms upward.

exercises.name: DIPS
exercises.instructions: Lower body between parallel bars, push back up.

exercises.name: OVERHEAD DUMBBELL EXTENSION
exercises.instructions: Extend dumbbell overhead, lower behind head, press up.

exercises.name: CLOSE-GRIP BENCH PRESS
exercises.instructions: Bench press with hands closer together to target triceps.

exercises.name: BARBELL CURL
exercises.instructions: Curl barbell upward keeping elbows fixed.

exercises.name: DUMBBELL CURLS
exercises.instructions: Alternate arms curling dumbbells upward.

exercises.name: HAMMER CURLS
exercises.instructions: Curl dumbbells with palms facing inward.

exercises.name: PREACHER CURLS
exercises.instructions: Perform curls seated on preacher bench.

exercises.name: CONCENTRATION CURLS
exercises.instructions: Sit and curl dumbbell with one arm focusing contraction.

exercises.name: OVERHEAD PRESS
exercises.instructions: Press barbell overhead from shoulders.

exercises.name: DUMBBELL LATERAL RAISE
exercises.instructions: Raise dumbbells outward to shoulder height.

exercises.name: FRONT RAISE
exercises.instructions: Raise dumbbells straight in front to shoulder level.

exercises.name: ARNOLD PRESS
exercises.instructions: Press dumbbells overhead while rotating wrists.

exercises.name: DUMBBELL SHRUGS
exercises.instructions: Lift shoulders upward holding dumbbells, squeeze traps.

exercises.name: BARBELL SQUAT
exercises.instructions: Squat down with barbell on back, push back up.

exercises.name: LEG PRESS
exercises.instructions: Press weight upward with legs on machine.

exercises.name: LUNGES
exercises.instructions: Step forward with one leg, lower until knees bend 90°.

exercises.name: LEG CURL MACHINE
exercises.instructions: Curl legs backward on machine targeting hamstrings.

exercises.name: CALF RAISES
exercises.instructions: Stand on toes lifting heels upward, squeeze calves.

exercises.name: PUSH-UPS
exercises.instructions: Keep body straight, lower chest to floor, and push back up.

exercises.name: MOUNTAIN CLIMBERS
exercises.instructions: Drive knees toward chest alternately in plank position.

exercises.name: BURPEES
exercises.instructions: Drop into push-up, jump back up explosively.

exercises.name: PLANK
exercises.instructions: Hold body straight supported by elbows and toes.

exercises.name: BODYWEIGHT SQUATS
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, lower hips until thighs parallel.

exercises.name: DIAMOND PUSH-UPS
exercises.instructions: Keep hands close under chest, form diamond shape, lower and push up.

exercises.name: TRICEP DIPS (CHAIR)
exercises.instructions: Support body on chair edge, lower down to 90 degrees, push back up.

exercises.name: HANDSTAND HOLD
exercises.instructions: Kick up into handstand against wall, hold position.

exercises.name: ARM CIRCLES
exercises.instructions: Rotate arms in small circles forward and backward.

exercises.name: PUSH-UP TO PLANK
exercises.instructions: Do a push-up then shift into forearm plank position.

exercises.name: LUNGES
exercises.instructions: Step forward with one leg, bend knees at 90 degrees.

exercises.name: GLUTE BRIDGES
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, push hips up while squeezing glutes.

exercises.name: WALL SIT
exercises.instructions: Slide down wall until thighs parallel, hold position.

exercises.name: SINGLE LEG DEADLIFT
exercises.instructions: Stand on one leg, hinge forward keeping back straight.

exercises.name: JUMPING SQUATS
exercises.instructions: Lower into squat and explode upward into a jump.

exercises.name: MOUNTAIN POSE
exercises.instructions: Stand tall with feet together, arms by side, breathing deeply.

exercises.name: FORWARD FOLD
exercises.instructions: Bend forward at hips, let head hang toward floor.

exercises.name: DOWNWARD DOG
exercises.instructions: Form inverted V-shape with hands and feet on floor, hips raised.

exercises.name: CAT-COW
exercises.instructions: Alternate arching and rounding back while on all fours.

exercises.name: CHILD'S POSE
exercises.instructions: Kneel and fold torso forward with arms stretched out.

exercises.name: WARRIOR I
exercises.instructions: Step forward, bend front knee, arms raised overhead.

exercises.name: WARRIOR II
exercises.instructions: Extend arms parallel, bend front knee at 90 degrees.

exercises.name: TRIANGLE POSE
exercises.instructions: Extend one arm to floor, other arm up, form a triangle shape.

exercises.name: PLANK POSE
exercises.instructions: Hold body in straight line supported by arms and toes.

exercises.name: CROW POSE
exercises.instructions: Balance body on hands with knees resting on upper arms.

exercises.name: CORPSE POSE
exercises.instructions: Lie flat on back with arms at sides, eyes closed, deep breathing.

exercises.name: SEATED TWIST
exercises.instructions: Sit with legs extended, twist torso with one arm behind you.

exercises.name: BUTTERFLY POSE
exercises.instructions: Sit with feet together, knees bent outward, hold feet with hands.

exercises.name: HAPPY BABY
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, grab feet, pull knees toward chest.

exercises.name: LEGS ON THE WALL
exercises.instructions: Lie on back with legs resting vertically on wall.

cardio.categoryDescription: Boost heart rate and burn calories

exercises.name: JUMPING SQUATS
exercises.instructions: Explosively jump from squat position.

exercises.name: BURPEES
exercises.instructions: Drop into push-up, jump back up explosively.

exercises.name: HIGH KNEES
exercises.instructions: Run in place bringing knees up to chest.

exercises.name: PLANK JACKS
exercises.instructions: Jump legs in and out while holding plank position.

exercises.name: MOUNTAIN CLIMBERS
exercises.instructions: Drive knees toward chest alternately in plank position.

exercises.name: TREADMILL JOG
exercises.instructions: Jog at steady pace on treadmill.

exercises.name: STATIONARY BIKE
exercises.instructions: Cycle at moderate pace on stationary bike.

exercises.name: ELLIPTICAL TRAINER
exercises.instructions: Maintain steady pace on elliptical machine.

exercises.name: ROWING MACHINE
exercises.instructions: Perform rowing motion keeping back straight.

exercises.name: STEPMILL CLIMBER
exercises.instructions: Climb steadily on stepmill machine.

exercises.name: JUMP ROPE
exercises.instructions: Jump rope at steady pace.

exercises.name: SPRINTS
exercises.instructions: Sprint at max effort then rest briefly.

exercises.name: BUTT KICKERS
exercises.instructions: Run in place kicking heels up to glutes.

exercises.name: SHADOW BOXING
exercises.instructions: Throw punches in air, moving around lightly.

exercises.name: SKATERS
exercises.instructions: Jump side to side like a speed skater.
